data.title: Tim Hortons Iceplex
data.meta_description:
Tim Hortons Iceplex | 282 followers on LinkedIn. Premier sports facility in Rochester, NY featuring 4 NHL sized rinks with over 1.5 million visitors annually.  | Tim Hortons Iceplex is a 176,000 square foot, participatory sports facility centrally located on the campus of Monroe Community College, in Rochester N.Y. The facility is home to 4 NHL sized ice rinks with the feature rink - Chick-fil-A Arena with 1,750 seats.

The facility is one of North America’s premier large-scale tournament venues, hosting numerous hockey events throughout the calendar year with teams competing from all over North America.
data.text: “I think our service is what sets us apart... We really like to see what each organization needs. We help with event enhancements to create a unique experience for the family and athletes. We act as a community connector, often connecting people to the right people to make their event successful, whether it’s through local government officials, restaurants, hotels or other visitor services for events.” Sports Sales Manager Rich Mackey said it best in the following article by Playeasy.com! Discover why Rochester is a premier sports destination, offering big-city amenities with small-town hospitality. #ROCNYSports #VisitROC
